data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to collect information about pregnancies that occurred during DCCT, their outcome, describing the health of the mother (e.g. presence of infections, preeclampsia, eclampsia), delivery conditions, and health of the newborn (e.g. weight, size, glucose levels). The data were collected whenever a pregnancy occurred during DCCT (start of collection Jan '91).

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: JFCOMDAT
variable.description: Date form was completed

variable.name: JFLEARN
variable.description: Date clinic learned of event

variable.name: JFD1DAT
variable.description: Date of (pregnancy) termination

variable.name: JFD3DAT
variable.description: Date of last menstrual period (lmp)

variable.name: JFE1DAT
variable.description: Date of birth

variable.name: JFE2DAT
variable.description: Starting date of last monthly period

variable.name: JFICDA
variable.description: ICDA complication code

variable.name: JFC2A
variable.description: Specify type of infection or illness during pregnancy - a

variable.name: JFC2B
variable.description: Specify type of infection or illness during pregnancy - b

variable.name: JFE5
variable.description: Delivery information: if induced, specify reason

variable.name: JFE7H
variable.description: Postpartum infection: specify other maternal illness

variable.name: JFDETHCA
variable.description: Neonatal complication: cause of death

variable.name: JFH1SPEC
variable.description: Any malformations present (specify)

variable.name: DUPOK
variable.description: NOTE: DCC reports that this variable was used for internal data management and should be ignored by analysts.

variable.name: JFF3
variable.description: Nursery admission: length (cm)

variable.name: JFF4
variable.description: Nursery admission: birth weight (grams)

variable.name: JFF5
variable.description: Nursery admission: head circumference (cm)

variable.name: JFF6
variable.description: Nursery admission: chest circumference (cm)

variable.name: JFG1C1
variable.description: Complication: highest measured level of bilirubin

variable.name: JFOCCUR
variable.description: Date of event/occurrence uncertain

variable.name: JFPRPREG
variable.description: How many prior pregnancies have you had

variable.name: JFABORT
variable.description: How many pregnancies resulted in induced abortion

variable.name: JFMCARG
variable.description: How many pregnancies resulted in miscarriages

variable.name: JFSTILLB
variable.description: How many pregnancies resulted in stillbirths

variable.name: JFLIVE
variable.description: How many pregnancies resulted in live births

variable.name: JFDEATH
variable.description: How many neonatal deaths occurred

variable.name: JFCHILIV
variable.description: How many children are still living

variable.name: JFPRETRM
variable.description: How many pregnancies were delivered preterm (< 37 weeks)

variable.name: JFPOSTRM
variable.description: How many pregnancies were delivered post-term (> 42 weeks)

variable.name: JFC1ASPI
variable.description: Aspirin taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1LITH
variable.description: Lithium taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1MARI
variable.description: Marijuana taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1ISOT
variable.description: Isotretinoin (Accutane) taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1COCA
variable.description: Cocaine taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1TETR
variable.description: Tetracycline taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1METH
variable.description: Methadone/heroin taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1ESTR
variable.description: Estrogens/progestins (including oral contraceptives) taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1ACOA
variable.description: Anticoagulants taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1AEPI
variable.description: Anti-epileptics taken during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC1OTH
variable.description: Other drug(s) taken during pregnancy: specify

variable.name: JFC2
variable.description: Infection or illness during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC2AWK
variable.description: If infection occurred: week of pregnancy during which pregnancy occurred or when ill - a

variable.name: JFC2BWK
variable.description: If infection occurred: week of pregnancy during which pregnancy occurred or when ill - b

variable.name: JFC3
variable.description: Preterm labor occurred

variable.name: JFC3A
variable.description: Preterm labor occurred: week of gestation

variable.name: JFC3BRIT
variable.description: Medicine used to stop labor: Ritodine

variable.name: JFC3BMAG
variable.description: Medicine used to stop labor: Magnesium

variable.name: JFC3BTER
variable.description: Medicine used to stop labor: Terbitaline

variable.name: JFC3BOTH
variable.description: Medicine used to stop labor: other

variable.name: JFC3C
variable.description: Medication succeeded in stopping labor

variable.name: JFC4A
variable.description: Preeclampsia/eclampsia present during pregnancy

variable.name: JFC4B1

variable.name: JFC4B2
variable.description: Criteria for preeclampsia: hypertension (< 140 or > 90 mmhg)

variable.name: JFC4B2WK

variable.name: JFC4B5
variable.description: Criteria for preeclampsia: change in renal function

variable.name: JFC4B5WK
variable.description: Criteria for preeclampsia: change in renal function - week of onset

variable.name: JFC4B6
variable.description: Criteria for preeclampsia: cerebal symptoms (e.g. lethargy, headache)

variable.name: JFC4B6WK
variable.description: Criteria for preeclampsia: cerebral symptoms - week of onset

variable.name: JFC4B7
variable.description: Criteria for preeclampsia: other

variable.name: JFC4B7WK
variable.description: Criteria for preeclampsia: other - week of onset

variable.name: JFC4C1
variable.description: Treatment of preeclampsia: delivery

variable.name: JFC4C1WK
variable.description: Treatment of preeclampsia: delivery - week of onset

variable.name: JFC4C2
variable.description: Treatment of preeclampsia: MgSO4

variable.name: JFC4C2WK
variable.description: Treatment of preeclampsia: MgSO4 - week of onset

variable.name: JFC4C3
variable.description: Treatment of preeclampsia: antihypertensive prescription

variable.name: JFC4C3WK
variable.description: Treatment of preeclampsia: antihypertensive prescription - week of onset

variable.name: JFC4C4
variable.description: Treatment of preeclampsia: other (specify)

variable.name: JFC4C4WK
variable.description: Treatment of preeclampsia: other - week of onset

variable.name: JFC4D5
variable.description: Eclampsia present

variable.name: JFC4D5WK
variable.description: Eclampsia present: week of onset

variable.name: JFC5
variable.description: Did any of the following maternal complications occur during pregnancy

variable.description: Pregnancy complications: spotting

variable.description: Pregnancy complications: spotting - week of onset

variable.name: JFC5B
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: bleeding

variable.name: JFC5BWK
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: bleeding - week of onset

variable.name: JFC5CWK

variable.name: JFC5EWK
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: placental abruption-week of onset

variable.name: JFC5F
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: anemia (HCT <= 30%)

variable.name: JFC5FWK

variable.name: JFC5G

variable.name: JFC5IWK

variable.name: JFC5J
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: D & C (dilation and curettage)

variable.name: JFC5JWK
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: D & C (dilation and curettage) - week of onset

variable.name: JFC5K
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: placenta previa

variable.name: JFC5KWK
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: placenta previa - week of onset

variable.name: JFC5L
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: premature rupture of membranes

variable.name: JFC5LWK
variable.description: Pregnancy complications: premature rupture of membrane - week of onset

variable.name: JFD2
variable.description: Termination of pregnancy: gestational age

variable.description: Delivery information - if Caesarian specify indication: failure of progression

variable.description: Delivery information - if Caesarian specify indication: cephalo-pelvic disproportion

variable.description: Delivery information - if Caesarian specify indication: fetal distress

variable.name: JFE6H
variable.description: Delivery information - if Caesarian specify indication: patient choice

variable.description: Delivery information - if Caesarian specify indication: other, specify

variable.name: JFE7A
variable.description: Postpartum infection: endometritis

variable.name: JFE7B

variable.description: Postpartum infection: chorioamnionitis during labor

variable.name: JFE7G

variable.name: JFF1
variable.description: Number of infants

variable.name: JFF2
variable.description: Infants' gender

variable.description: Nursery admission: apgar scores at 1 minutes after birth

variable.description: Nursery admission: apgar scores at 5 minutes after birth

variable.value: OTHER THAN NURSERY 12 OR MORE HOURS

variable.name: JFF10
variable.description: Lowest venous glucose level during first 6 hours of life

variable.description: Father's age at time of birth

variable.description: Neonatal complication (72 hours after birth): hypocalcemia (cal.< 7.0mg/d1)

variable.name: JFG1E
variable.description: Neonatal complication (72 hours after birth): abnormal state consciousness

variable.name: JFG1F
variable.description: Neonatal complication (72 hours after birth): other (list)

variable.description: Neonatal complication (72 hours after birth): birth trauma

variable.name: JFDETHDT

variable.description: Date of examination

variable.name: JFH1
variable.description: Malformations present
